divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were sitting outside on a the deck of our lake cottage at coldwater lake. I looked up and saw what appeared to be a star but it was moving very fast across the sky. It moved across the sky dipped down, slowed down then went up and eventually faded away.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Coldwater
There were 3 other sightings in Coldwater on or around June 10th 2012
Summary: look like a star flew across the sky turned down then up then faded away as if it took off out of the atmosphere
